subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous forts were built during the reign of Rana Kumbha?
question_hi: राजनीतिक समय के राणा कुम्भा के समय के आधारनेवाले भवनों
explanation_en: During the reign of Rana Kumbha, the famous forts built were Mehrangarh Fort in Jodhpur and Kumbhalgarh Fort in Kumbhalgarh.
explanation_hi: राजनीतिक समय के समयक बनने वाले भवन के मैं मेहरांगर और कुम्भलगार
